mapper.update:
update cere_shop_distribution_level
shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level_num = #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level_logo = #{levelLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
if_self = #{ifSelf,jdbcType=BIT},
if_money = #{ifMoney,jdbcType=BIT}, if_invitation = #{ifInvitation,jdbcType=BIT}, if_customer = #{ifCustomer,jdbcType=BIT}, condition_money = #{conditionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, condition_invitation = #{conditionInvitation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, condition_customer = #{conditionCustomer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direct_proportion = #{directProportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indirect_proportion = #{indirectProportion,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where distributor_level_id = #{distributorLevelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update cere_shop_distribution_level set shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, level_name = #{levelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level_num = #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_logo = #{levelLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, if_self = #{ifSelf,jdbcType=BIT}, if_money = #{ifMoney,jdbcType=BIT}, if_invitation = #{ifInvitation,jdbcType=BIT}, if_customer = #{ifCustomer,jdbcType=BIT}, condition_money = #{conditionMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, condition_invitation = #{conditionInvitation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, condition_customer = #{conditionCustomer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direct_proportion = #{directProportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, indirect_proportion = #{indirectProportion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where distributor_level_id = #{distributorLevelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT distributor_level_id, shop_id, level_name, level_num, level_logo, if_self, if_money,if_invitation,if_customer,condition_money, condition_invitation,condition_customer, direct_proportion, indirect_proportion FROM cere_shop_distribution_level where shop_id=#{shopId}

SELECT distributor_level_id, shop_id, level_name, level_num, level_logo, if_self,if_money,if_invitation,if_customer,condition_money, condition_invitation,condition_customer,direct_proportion, indirect_proportion FROM cere_shop_distribution_level where distributor_level_id != #{distributorLevelId} and shop_id=#{shopId} ORDER BY create_time DESC

select
from cere_shop_distribution_level where shop_id = #{shopId} and level_num = #{levelNum} limit 1

select
from cere_shop_distribution_level where shop_id = #{shopId} and level_num > #{levelNum} order by level_num limit 1

select
from cere_shop_distribution_level where shop_id = #{shopId} and level_num < #{levelNum} order by level_num desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE cere_shop_distribution_level SET if_self=#{ifSelf},update_time=#{time} WHERE shop_id = #{shopId}
